name: <name of setting e.g. cassandra, scylla, etc.>
secureConnectionBundle: <link to '*.zip' file, downloaded from AstraDB web>
columnNames: <A comma-separated list of column names to be used in the query>
whereClause: <A custom clause to be added in the WHERE condition when building CQL queries>
cqlQuery: <A custom CQL query used to retrieve data>
